General.Name: Mango Excellent Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Mango Excellent Media Co., Ltd. operates in the internet new media industry. It operates through Mango TV Internet Video Business, New Media Interactive Entertainment Content Production, Content e-Business, and Others segments. The company operates Mango TV, an internet video servicing platform. It is also involved in the membership, advertising, IPTV, OTT, films, and TV dramas, variety shows, artist agency, music copyright operation, and IP derivative development activities; live entertainment; and content e-commerce platform activities. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Changsha, China. Mango Excellent Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Mango Media Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Golden Eagle TV Culture City, Changsha, China, 410003
